common.title: Footprints of the North - Canine Community
common.description: The ultimate guide to enjoying Northern Spain with your dog.

nav.pro_mobile: Are you a professional? Join here

hero.description: Huellas del Norte brings together dog-friendly services, businesses and leisure in one place: from 24h veterinarians to water trails.

home.highlights_title: A Living Map For Dog Owners
home.highlight_map_desc: Discover accommodations, restaurants and dog trails with filters by area, service type and accessibility.
home.highlight_calendar_desc: Dog meetups, adoption days and water activities to enjoy all year round.
home.highlight_community_desc: Connect with shelters, associations and networks helping lost dogs.
home.layers_desc: Dog-friendly beaches, 24h vets, kennels with real-time occupancy, water/shade trails, pet-friendly restaurants, dog transport and municipal regulations. Every point is validated with public sources or direct integration.
home.tech_desc: Curated technology for canine safety, health and well-being.
home.integration_1: Occupancy API for dog kennels and hotels.
home.integration_2: Official beach and regulation sources by region.
home.integration_3: Directory of veterinary colleges and emergencies.
home.integration_4: Routes verified by community and authorities.
home.legal_desc: Digital passport, mandatory courses, insurance, telemedicine and AI-assisted triage.
home.assistance_desc: Curated directory of guide, assistance and therapy dogs with filters by region and type.
home.business_desc: Here are the categories you'll find in our directory. Everything designed for real life with your dog.
home.biz_subs_desc: Businesses can register and update their information with a quick form. We also offer subscriptions to stand out on the map.
home.biz_subs_cta: I want to appear on the map
home.map_desc: Discover kennels, vets, dog beaches and dogs for adoption near you. Activate the layers you're interested in.
home.leisure_desc: From water trails to useful content and resources: everything organized so you can plan your week with your dog.
home.db_desc: Basic profiles, loss alerts, adoptions and shelters with up-to-date information.
home.calendar_desc: Publish events, meetups and water trails so others can join.
home.collab_map_desc: The community can suggest new places and verify if they're still pet friendly.
home.content_desc: Podcasts, books, manuals, YouTube channels, canine tech and movies for those who live the dog world to the fullest.

footer.description: Map, trails, adoption and pet-friendly services for Northern Spain and the Atlantic Arc.
footer.copyright: Â© 2026 Huellas del Norte. All rights reserved.

about_us.label: About Us
about_us.title: A community that makes dog life easier
about_us.description: Huellas del Norte brings together useful information, local resources, and an active network for those living with dogs in Northern Spain.
about_us.mission_desc: Facilitate daily decisions with reliable data, an active community, and tools designed for everyday life.
about_us.vision_desc: A more dog-friendly territory, where information is clear and accessible.

values.wellbeing_desc: We prioritize safety, health, and positive experiences for dogs and families.
values.community_desc: We believe in collaboration between people, associations, and professionals.
values.territory_desc: We care for the Northern Peninsula and its ecosystem with useful and updated information.
values.culture_desc: We promote responsible leisure, informed adoption, and quality resources.

links.title: Useful Links
links.desc: Learn more about our community and services.

contact.label: Contact
contact.title: We are here to help you
contact.description: If you find an error, want to collaborate or need support, write to us.

form.title: Form
form.message_placeholder: Tell us how we can help

support.general_desc: We resolve questions about accounts, content and platform operation.
support.collab_desc: If you are a professional or entity and want to appear on the map, tell us your case.
support.verification_desc: Send us proofs or links if you detect incomplete or incorrect data.

links.title: Useful Links
links.desc: Resources to correct data, collaborate or know the platform.

routes.title: Atlantic Arc Routes
routes.description: More than 50 pet-friendly routes from Iparralde to Galicia. Filter by region, difficulty, environment and discover trails with water, shade and bathing for your dog.
routes.search_placeholder: Search by name, region or characteristics...
routes.no_results: No routes found with the selected filters.

bathing.allowed_desc: This route has areas where your dog can bathe.
bathing.forbidden_desc: Bring enough water for your dog.

route_detail.tips_title: Tips for going with your dog

tips.bags: Bring bags to pick up waste
tips.water: Fresh water and a portable bowl are essential
tips.heat: Avoid the hottest hours in summer
tips.leash: Keep your dog on a leash in marked areas

download.title: Download route
download.desc: Compatible with Garmin, Suunto, Komoot and other apps

tips.heat_warning: High temperature, risk of heat stroke
tips.extra_water: Bring extra water for your dog
tips.coat: Consider a coat for short-haired dogs
